originalText.text: I come to this place to take art or craft type classes. The staff is friendly and helpful. It has a ramp for persons with mobility issues n handicapped issues. They finally obtained and installed air conditioning to cool off an otherwise hot space. So appreciated.

originalText.text: There's a therapist name LAKEN..IM TELLING YOU DONT TRUST HER AT ALL..SHE ALMOST GOT MY EMOTIONAL SUPPORT DOG KILLED..I HAVE BEEN APART OF THIS COMPANY WAY BEFORE THIS CHICK CAME, NEVER HAD A PROBLEM.THAT USE TO BE MY SAFE SPACE..NOW AFTER SHE LIED AND THE COPS AND EMS COME TO HOUSE MY LIFE AND DOGS LIFEWAS  IN DANGER..I TRUST NO TYPE OF THERAPIST. THAT AREA IS NOT A SAFE PLACE FOR ANYMORE.SHE TRIED TO PRESSURE ME INTO DOING SOMETHING ELSE I TOLD HER I WAS NOT READY AND SHE CALLED THE COPS..I I AM TELLING YOU PEOPLE FACTS AND TRUST ME THEY DO NOT CARE ABOUT YOUR SAFTY.

originalText.text:
I was at the University Settlement for The Universal Rent Control for New York State called the Rent Laws Town Hall on April 6, 2019.

The address for the Universally Settlement is 184 Eldridge Street in the Lower East Side (LES)  area of New York City.

It was NYC Tenents and Elected Officiials join together to fight keeping  NYC renters protected.

The elected Officials confirmed to attend was:

NY State Assemblymember Niou,

NY State Assemblymember
Epstein,

NY State Senator Hoylman & NY State Senator Kavanagh.

There was already a lot of NYC Tenants seated by 2 pm when i arrived, and there was more arriving.  There were NYC Tenants from all walks of life, and many were quite upset.

Rent increases is not a pleasant topic to digest.  Every New Yorker Rentor and NYC Rentor have had their rent increased year after year, aome every 2 years if they opt for a 2 year lease.
